DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to collect pancreatic tissue, blood and urine from adults to study pancreatic abnormalities.
DOC.brief_title: Pancreatic and Gastrointestinal Tumor Registry and Tissue Collection
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of the study is to standardize, collect and share pancreatic cancer related information, to be used for research purposes only by researchers from different participating institutions/centers.
DOC.criteria: Person over 19 years of age, patient with a tissueproven diagnosis of pancreatic cancer at the University of Alabama at Birmingham (UAB) University Hospital during the period, and cognitive ability to provide informed consent Person not 19 or older and have not had a tissueproven diagnosis of pancreatic cancer.
